answers.answer: I have had it with all my pregnancies.. unfortunately I couldn't find much relief either. Try yoga cat and cow..it is safe and can help you get baby in a more comfortable position.  Hang in there.
thanks chick will try that. x
I've read that rib pain can b sign of preeclampsia habe u had blood ppressure checked recently or may just be baba sitting awkward

question: Hi this my first ever question on here so i'm hoping i get some response. anyways i'm 37 weeks pregnant tomro with 2nd baby and am suffering from really bad rib pain under my right breast, midwife said theres nothing to do and to wait till baby drops lower but i cant cope with the pain anymore anyone else experienced it? Please help!!
title: rib pain
